data.title: After Short special César 2024
data.meta_description: First part of the special César 2024 After Short with Claire Kmy, organised by ESRA in partnership with Format Court.
data.text:
First part of the special César 2024 After Short with Claire Kmy, organised by ESRA in

in partnership with Format Court .

Ceremony representing the short films shortlisted for the César 2024 in fiction, open to the public

by the director and member of the committee of the Académie des Arts et Techniques du Cinéma (Les

César), Dominik Moll and the Head of the Short Film Department and the Education Unit at

Académie des Arts et Techniques du Cinéma (Les César), Kenza Manach.

We were in the company of:
